You don't often get email from caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com. Learn why this is important <https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification>  
	

[EXTERNAL ?]

Hi Tim,

I want to make sure you're not waiting on me to combine the documents into one agreement. I know we spoke yesterday but I am now second guessing myself. Can you please remind me if that's something your team is doing or if you need us to?
	
 
Caroline Fraher
Account Executive



 https://www.instagram.com/flocksafety/ 

 <https://gifo.srv.wisestamp.com/s/rfcustom/108062/26/trans.png>  caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com 

	
 

	
 	 
 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/1XrlOmpdrQPY.png>

	Updated form attached

	Thanks!

Caroline Fraher
Account Executive

	On Mon, Mar 17, 2025 at 11:36?AM Caroline Fraher <caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com > wrote:
	

		Good morning Tim,

		Here is the final order form. Are you able to merge all of the documents into one file, or would you like me to do that? 

		I should have the named COI within the next day or so.
	
 https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/b3ca262e-71be-4f6f-b474--com 	 
Caroline Fraher
Account Executive

 https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/b3ca262e-71be-4f6f-b474-0fbb2907b41e/NB2HI4DTHIXS653XO4XGY2LONNSWI2LOFZRW63JPMNXW24DBNZ4S6ZTMN5RWWLLTMFTGK5DZ/HFQWIMRQGQ4WIODDGFTDSM3EHFRDAYRXGEYWEMBUMRSDQNJWHA4TANJZGAYGEY3C/www-linkedin-com-company-flock-safety 

 https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/b3ca262e-71be-4f6f-b474-0fbb2907b41e/NB2HI4DTHIXS653XO4XGS3TTORQWO4TBNUXGG33NF5TGY33DNNZWCZTFOR4S6===/MFTDKYZSGFTGMODGGBSTOYZUGZQTKMRUMU3GIMLGMU3WGYLCMRTGCZRSGI2DCNJV/www-instagram-com-flocksafety

		 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/1XrlOmpdrQPY.png> 

		 <https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/open/b3ca262e-71be-4f6f-b474-0fbb2907b41e.gif> 

		On Mon, Mar 17, 2025 at 11:18?AM COSTIN Timothy M <TCostin@eugene-or.gov TCostin@eugene-or.gov > wrote:
		

			Hi Caroline,

			 

			Thanks for taking my call last Friday, we will await the finalized order form to include in the contract.

			 

			Insurance � Would you please request a COI with the City of Eugene named? Thank you!

			 

			Contract Process: As discussed, since this is a City contract, we request that Flock is the first signor. Once Flock signs, please return a copy to Nikki and I, and we will route for signatures on the City�s side through our internal process. Once countersigned, we will return the fully executed copy to you, setup a PO, and send billing instructions. 

			 

			Once we have the final order form, I�ll coordinate further with you if we have any final details or questions. We look forward to have this wrapped up soon!

			 

			Thank you for your collaboration on this.

			 

			Best,

			 

			Tim Costin

			Sr. Financial Analyst

			Eugene Police Department

			300 Country Club Road

			Eugene, Oregon 97401

			Office: (541) 682-8364

			Cell: (541) 844-9015

			 

			

			 

			 

			 

			 

			 

			 

			From: Caroline Fraher <caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com > 
			Sent: Thursday, March 13, 2025 2:47 PM
			To: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >; COSTIN Timothy M <TCostin@eugene-or.gov TCostin@eugene-or.gov >; CHOTERUNGRUANGKORN Nikki <NChoterungruangkorn@eugene-or.gov NChoterungruangkorn@eugene-or.gov >; KANNEN Mark R <MKannen@eugene-or.gov MKannen@eugene-or.gov >
			Subject: Eugene PD x Flock - clean contract

			 

			[EXTERNAL ?]

			Hi all, 

			
			Thank you again for your time today. I have attached the 2 clean documents, as well as our W9 and COI. If you'd like the City of Eugene to be named on the COI, please let me know.

			 

			Captain Burke and I are finalizing a few camera locations, and then I will be able to generate the final order form, which will be included in the final document to be signed (The final cost will not exceed $174k/yr, as discussed).

			
			Please let me know when you have confirmed the contract language is how it should be, so we can start the process to route the contract for signature. 

			 

			On that note, typically I route the contract for signature. First signer as Eugene City Manager, Second signer as Flock General Counsel Mark Smith. Will you please confirm the following: 

			1. Are you ok with me being the one to route for signature via DocuSign?

			2. Sarah Medary as Eugene CM and contract signer

			3. Can Eugene sign first, or would you prefer Flock to?

			 

			Thank you!

	
 https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/797ab319-793a-47f2-831d--com 

Caroline Fraher
Account Executive
